channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: University Of Virginia Ends DEI, Race-Based Admissions After DOJ Pressure

item.title: Apparently, We Still Need to Explain Why Communism Is Wrong
item.description: The good news is that we still have the antidote to all the nonsense out there.

item.title: Pennsylvania Judiciary Committee Passes Six Extreme Abortion Measures
item.description: Over strenuous objections of outnumbered Republicans, committee Democrats quickly passed six radical abortion-related measures.

item.title: American Heritage Is No Myth, It’s The Source Of Our Liberty And Peace
item.description: A shared American identity and cultural heritage isn’t some nativist delusion, it’s the only reason we’re not a collection of warring tribes.

item.title: Why the App Store Freedom Act Undercuts Innovation
item.description: Top-down mandates for app marketplaces threaten free markets, investor incentives, and the very security frameworks that support them.

item.title: Yes, There Is Such A Thing As A Heritage American
item.description: Remembering the particular cultural heritage of the Founding keeps us anchored in a uniquely American identity — one the left is desperate to destroy.

item.title: Comey’s Attorney In Criminal Leaking Case Is One Of The Guys Comey Leaked FBI Memos To
item.description: Comey hired as a lawyer none other than one of the people he leaked to, private attorney Patrick Fitzgerald.

item.title: Basic Economics Comes for the Music Industry
item.description: Ticket prices will remain high until fans stop paying them.

item.title: No, Trump Isn’t Destroying the White House
item.description: Good grief, people. Pull yourselves together.
